description:
Advanced multi-source music streaming + discovery client for desktop. Free, clean, no login, no ads.

muffon is a cross-platform music streaming client for desktop, which helps you listen to, discover and organize music in an advanced way.
It retrieves audio, video and metadata from various Internet sources, such as:
- Last.FM
- VK
- Odnoklassniki
- Yandex Music
- Spotify
- Bandcamp
- Deezer
- SoundCloud
- YouTube Music
- YouTube
- Discogs
- Genius
- MusixMatch
- MusicBrainz
Features
- Add YouTube Music to audio sources
Changes / Improvements
- Add views count to YouTube Music search playlists
- Add duration / views count to YouTube Music search videos
- Add channels’ links to video playlist’s videos
- Add channel link to video playlist
- Add descriptions to simple lists’ videos
- Change videos’ “Related” videos to “Similar”
- Remove tracks search in videos’ search section on track’s page
- Add "Go to video page" link to YouTube Music track’s page
- Remove Deezer from audio sources
- Change sources orders (alphabetical for all sources, by bitrate for audio sources)
- Add maximum bitrate values to source select options in track’s options menu
- Move player’s automatch logic to the server
- Add more fractions to UI scale setting’s slider
- Change current track highlight logic
- Change playlists import logic (+ add tracks import progress)
- Change Spotify's audio maximum bitrate
- Change "Anonymous" to "Guest”
- Add toggle button for password fields’ type
- Change equalizer UI
Fixes
- Fix bug with redundant language param in Spotify connection link
- Fix UI bug on library tag’s page's info section
- Fix bug with mistaken sanitization of some links
- Fix bug with missing source icon of album groups in search results
- Fix bug with some sidebar items not being highlighted on respective pages
- Fix bug when queue's "Clear" button didn't hide options popup
- Fix bug when images in update forms were reuploaded in lesser size
- Fix YouTube player errors
- Fix (?) bug with toggle checkbox loop in some occasions
- Fix bug with window flash on launch when “Maximize on start” option is on
- Fix bug with empty extra segment on other profile's library page
- Fix bug when player's fallback sources weren’t working if track from first source wasn’t found
- Fix bug when imported tracks' files had no creation date
- Fix bug when "Go to library" / "Go to page" options didn't hide artist's / album's / track's options popup
